newsitem.title: POLAND: PEKAO UNDERWRITES UNIVERSAL BOND ISSUE.
newsitem.headline: PEKAO UNDERWRITES UNIVERSAL BOND ISSUE.

text.p: The Polish state-owned bank Pekao SA uderwrote trading company Universal SA's 100-million- zloty convertible bond issue, Universal said in a statement on Thursday.
Universal said that by March 18 the bonds would be taken by investors including Pekao SA.
It said Pekao SA would allot the bonds to other investors on the secondary market.

Universal earlier said it wanted to issue 1,000 convertible bonds with a semi-annual 5.5-percent coupon. It said the bonds would later be converted into 10,000 common shares each between April 1, 1997, and December 21, 2001.
